scripts.build: rimraf .next && rimraf node_modules/@types/react && rimraf node_modules/react && NODE_ENV=production next build && NODE_ENV=production next export
scripts.build-local: NODE_ENV=production next build && NODE_ENV=production next export
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run run-test
scripts.test-local: npm run build-local && npm run run-test
scripts.run-test: concurrently -s first --kill-others "npm run start-server" "npm run play:test"
scripts.test:debug:
chokidar '**/*.spec.ts'  -c 'echo "
{path} was modified
" && npm run play:test -- --retries=0 {path} --debug'
scripts.test:watch: chokidar '**/*.spec.ts' '**/*.page.tsx' -c 'test_file_path=$(echo {path} | sed s/page.tsx/spec.ts/) && npm run play:test -- --retries=0 ${test_file_path}'
scripts.ci:test: concurrently -s first --kill-others "npm run start-server -- -s" "npm run play:test"
